alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 6:05PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Hudson, Queens, Bronx, Kings, New York (Manhattan) and west central Nassau Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 605 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Brooklyn Heights, or near Crown Heights, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jersey City, Jamaica, Flatbush, Flushing, Mott Haven, Hoboken, East Tremont, Coney Island, Garden City, Mineola, Great Neck, Crown Heights, Throgs Neck Bridge, Midtown Manhattan and RFK Bridge. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for northeastern New Jersey...and southeastern New York.

area.areaDesc: Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Nassau; Northern Queens; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens
